CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note: We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
OldVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note:  We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Modern Translation in Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description:
In Outlook, you can translate words, phrases, and full messages when you need them. You can also set Outlook to automatically translate messages you receive in other languages. When you receive an email message in another language, you'll see a prompt at the top of the message asking if you'd like Outlook to translate it into your preferred language.

More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/translator-for-outlook-3d7e12ed-99d6-406e-a453-b9db0d9653fa#OfficeVersion=newer-win

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Modern Translation in Outlook on the Web
OldVersion.description:
In Outlook, you can translate words, phrases, and full messages when you need them. You can also set Outlook to automatically translate messages you receive in other languages. When you receive an email message in another language, you'll see a prompt at the top of the message asking if you'd like Outlook to translate it into your preferred language.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/translator-for-outlook-3d7e12ed-99d6-406e-a453-b9db0d9653fa#OfficeVersion=newer-win

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Copilot
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remove items from your activity feed
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to remove items they no longer need from their activity feed, helping the user stay on top of their notifications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remove items from your activity feed
OldVersion.description:
Users will be able to
remove items they no longer need from their activity feed, helping the user
stay on top of their notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
OldVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Calendar notifications in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now triage the calendar notifications in their Activity Feed and will get notifications for meeting invites, updates, cancellations, and forwards (if the user is the meeting organizer). These notifications will show up as unread in the Activity Feed pane and will display the details when a user clicks on it.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
CurrentVersion.description: We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Create Goals Tab in Microsoft Teams Chats and Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to add Viva Goals as a tab in a Microsoft Teams chat or channel, so that they can see their goals in the flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.
